Statistics.description: Students should take one of the statistics courses listed below.

Electives.description: All students are required to complete three electives from the following options: INFO 2300 or INFO 2310*, CS 2110/2112, CS 3110, CS 3410, and any INFO 3000+ course including INFO 4900 (excluding INFO 4998 and INFO 4910). Electives must be taken for a letter grade, each must earn three or more credit hours, and must be completed with a grade of C- or higher (a grade of C or higher is required for courses taken abroad). Students may only fulfill one of their electives with INFO 4900. *INFO 2300 and INFO 2310 overlap in content so both courses cannot count towards the major.
Electives.subject: INFO
